attributes.action: Calling for resignation of Colin Brewer independent councillor Wadebridge East
attributes.additional_details: After telling a disability group that 'disabled children should be PUT DOWN', we deem this man to be unfit to hold public office and to add insult to injury the man REFUSES to resign - in view of the thousands of parents of disabled children up and down Britain!  We call for his immediate resignation  - and that a full public apology should be made to those parents and children who he has insulted, whilst in a public office!
